incident_updates.body: Start time : 23/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 23/04/2022 19:00UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We need to make a water manifoLd replacement
We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the intervention to the following dates Start time : 25/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 28/04/2044 15:30 UTC
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 20/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 25/04/2044 15:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The objective is to remove the batteries from the bays following the undulation of the room
Start time : 25/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 28/04/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Annual maintenance of a generator
Start time : 25/04/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 25/04/2022 19:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: Water manifold replacement
Start time :25/04/2022 21:00 UTC End time : 25/04/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: We are making this change because the equipment has a bug, it needs to be restarted.

Start time : 26/04/2022 00:30 UTC End time : 26/04/2022 02:30 UTC Service impact : vRack will be unreachable for 15 minutes Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the vRack switch.
Start time : 26/04/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 26/04/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The main objective of this maintenance is to test UPS batteries
Start time : 26/04/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 26/04/2022 19:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: Water manifold replacement
Start time : 26/04/2022 21:00 UTC End time : 27/04/2022 03:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We need to standardize the configuration of the SBG Core.

Start time : 27/04/2022 00:30 UTC End time : 27/04/2022 02:30 UTC Service impact : vRack will be unreachable for 15 minutes Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the vRack switch.
Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the convention to the following dates : Start time : 27/04/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 27/04/2022 15:00 UTC

Start time : 14/04/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 14/04/2022 17:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : This maintenance consists of checking the operating condition of the high voltage generators.
Start time : 27/04/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 27/04/2022 19:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 28/04/2022 00:30 UTC End time : 28/04/2022 02:30 UTC Service impact : vRack will be unreachable for 15 minutes Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the vRack switch.
Start time : 28/04/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 29/04/2022 01:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 28/04/2022 12:00 UTC End time : 28/04/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : Some latency may be observed during the maintenance Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the version of a network equipment.

Start time : 28/04/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 29/04/2022 02:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to migrate some clients to a new infrastructure due to the old one approching to its end of life.

Start time : 02/05/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 02/05/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the version of a TOR (Top of Rack) switch.

Start time : 02/05/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 02/05/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the TOR(top of rack) Switch for a homogeneous infrastructure

Start time : 02/05/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 02/05/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the version of a TOR (Top of Rack) switch.

Start time : 03/05/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 03/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : Switching the ups to static bypass and battery discharge test Service improvement: The main objective of this maintenance is to perform annual/curative maintenance of a UPS
Start time : 04/05/2022 03:30 UTC End time : 04/05/2022 05:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : This operation aims to homogenise our infrastructure to improve services

Start time : 04/05/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 04/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : switch to battery charging for 1 minute Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to test UPS batteries

Start time : 05/05/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 05/05/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : During this operation, there will be a reduction in the autonomy of the inverter Service improvement : As part of the preventive replacement of batteries that have reached the end of their useful life, we will be doing full battery replacements for the UPS 6A.

Start time : 06/05/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 06/05/2022 12:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of power to specific individual servers on the rack Service improvement: Replacement of all faulty C13/C14 cables in a bay

Start time : 09/05/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 12/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : During this operation, there will be a reduction in the autonomy of the inverter Service improvement : The purpose of this maintenance is to replace out-of-service or damaged batteries in a UPS
Start time : 25/05/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 25/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to do some electrical work
Start time : 30/05/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 30/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to do some electrical work
Start time : 23/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 23/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to carry out annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
Start time : 10/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will perform load tests on the generators.
